sarah.name: Sarah J.
sarah.comment: The monthly membership is worth every penny! I've learned so much more than I expected.

michael.name: Michael T.
michael.title: Travel Blogger & Karate Student
michael.comment: As a travel blogger, I love learning martial arts from different cultures. This platform lets me train whenever I have free time, no matter where I am in the world.

sophia.name: Sophia L.
sophia.title: Fitness Coach & Taekwondo Student
sophia.comment: The ability to contact instructors directly through WhatsApp has been invaluable. Getting personalized feedback on my technique has accelerated my progress dramatically.

david.name: David R.
david.title: BJJ Practitioner
david.comment: I purchased the Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu course a year ago and still refer back to it regularly. The video quality is excellent, and I can review techniques whenever I need a refresher.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to common questions about Kong Fu Master

courseAccess.q1: How do I purchase a course?
courseAccess.a1: You can browse the courses page, select a course you're interested in, click the 'Purchase This Course' button, and complete the purchase through our secure payment process. After successful payment, you will immediately gain access to the course.
courseAccess.q2: What's the difference between membership and single course purchase?
courseAccess.a2: Single course purchase only grants access to the specific course you buy, valid for 1 year. Monthly membership ($39.99/month) provides unlimited access to all 100+ courses, plus additional benefits like video downloads, direct instructor contact, live Q&A participation, and more.
courseAccess.q3: How does the 3-day free trial work?
courseAccess.a3: New users can activate a 3-day free trial to access all membership courses for free. Before the trial ends, you can cancel your subscription without any charges. If you don't cancel, it will automatically convert to a monthly membership and billing will begin.
courseAccess.q4: How soon can I start learning after purchase?
courseAccess.a4: Course access is activated immediately after successful payment, and you can start learning right away. You can find all your purchased courses on the 'My Courses' page.

membership.q1: What benefits does monthly membership include?
membership.a1: Monthly membership ($39.99/month) includes: unlimited access to all 100+ courses, download videos for offline viewing, direct contact with instructors via WhatsApp, participate in live Q&A sessions, access to member-exclusive content, and more.
membership.q2: How many courses can members access?
membership.a2: Members have unlimited access to all courses on the platform. Currently, there are 100+ professional martial arts courses covering Tai Chi, Shaolin, Wing Chun, self-defense, children's martial arts, and more categories. We continuously add new courses.
membership.a3: Yes, monthly members can download course videos to their local devices for offline viewing anytime, anywhere, without network restrictions. This is very convenient for users who want to learn in environments without internet access.
membership.q4: How do I cancel my membership subscription?
membership.a4: You can go to the 'My' page and click the 'Cancel Subscription' button in the subscription status section. After cancellation, your membership benefits will expire at the end of the current billing cycle and will not be terminated immediately.

payment.a1: We support various secure and convenient payment methods, including: Visa, MasterCard and other international credit cards, as well as Alipay, WeChat Pay and other third-party payment platforms. All payments are processed securely through Stripe encryption.
payment.q2: How do I apply for a refund?
payment.a2: Please log in to your account, go to the 'My Orders' page, find the order you want to refund, and click the 'Apply for Refund' button. Single course purchases can be refunded within 7 days if viewing time does not exceed 20%; memberships can be fully refunded within 3 days if benefits are unused. See our refund policy for details.
payment.q3: How long does it take for a refund to arrive?
payment.a3: After your refund application is approved, we will refund the amount to your original payment account within 5-7 business days. The specific arrival time depends on your payment institution and bank's processing speed, usually completed within 7-14 business days.
payment.q4: Can I get a refund for courses I've already watched?
payment.a4: If you have watched more than 20% of the course content or purchased more than 7 days ago, refunds are not supported. However, if the course has serious quality issues or significantly differs from the description, you can contact customer service to explain the situation, and we will conduct a special review.

learning.q1: How do I track my learning progress?
learning.a1: The system automatically records your learning progress. On the 'My Courses' page, you can see the completion percentage, last viewing time, and other information for each course. The course details page also displays the completion status of each chapter.
learning.a2: Yes, our course videos support multi-language subtitles, including Chinese, English, Japanese, Korean, German, French, and Arabic. You can select your preferred subtitle language in the video player.
learning.a3: Monthly members can download course videos to local devices for offline viewing. Single course purchase users need to watch online, but our videos support adaptive bitrate, ensuring smooth playback even with slower internet connections.
learning.q4: How long is the course validity period?
learning.a4: Single course purchases are valid for 1 year, with unlimited viewing during the validity period. Monthly members can access all courses during the subscription period. After canceling the subscription, access will be lost at the end of the current billing cycle.

account.q1: How do I modify my personal information?
account.a1: After logging in, go to the 'My' page and click the 'Account Settings' tab to modify personal information such as your name. Email address serves as the unique account identifier and cannot be modified at this time.
account.q2: What if I forget my password?
account.a2: Click the 'Forgot Password' link on the login page and enter your registered email. We will send a password reset link to your email. After clicking the link, you can set a new password.
account.q3: How do I delete my account?
account.a3: To delete your account, please send an email to zjhkrun@gmail.com explaining your deletion request. Please note that after account deletion, your learning records, purchase records, and other data will be permanently deleted, and purchased courses and membership benefits cannot be recovered.

technical.q1: What should I do if the video won't play?
technical.a1: Please first check if your internet connection is normal. If the network is fine but the video still won't play, try refreshing the page or switching browsers. If the problem persists, please contact customer service and provide your device model and browser version information.
technical.a2: Our platform supports all mainstream modern browsers, including Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge, etc. For the best experience, we recommend using the latest version of your browser.
technical.q3: Can I use it on mobile devices?
technical.a3: Yes, our website fully supports mobile device access. You can visit https://www.kongfunow.com in your mobile or tablet browser and enjoy the same learning experience as on desktop. Member users can also download videos to mobile devices for offline viewing.
